name: Taking Flight
description:
This is a short narrative Bitsy game made for Mini Jam 99: Birds. I apologize if there are bugs or issues with the game-- please let me know if you encounter any and I'll do my best to fix them in the future!

---

In Taking Flight, you are a small bird named Astelle collecting the letters of someone you once loved more than anything in the world. Featuring an original soundtrack, the game leads players through an introspective, peaceful journey. The only catch is that once you move forward, there's no turning back. All you can do is keep moving.
